title: How to know Menses has ended, Do not hasten to take ghusl until you have seen your purity
transcript:
[Questioner] from Bangladesh   my question is my Menses usually last 
for six days and on the fourth day when   i answer the call of Nature and then do istinjaa 
and I use the tissue to see whether my Menses   has ended or not I see not discharge but that is 
because I just cleaned my private part but after   like walking or sitting for an hour or two I 
get blood or brownish usually its discharge   coming out so my question is how long should 
my dryness last because blood comes and goes ordered women not to haste until they see 
the sign of Purity and the sign of Purity   as mother aisha explained and others 
is the white thread like discharge   so when a woman wipes she finds a white thread 
like discharge that indicates her Purity no   brownish or yellowish discharge associated with 
it if she doesn't see it and she knows that her   Menses is six days she has to wait until the 
sixth day if the sixth day comes and still she   does not see it but there is dryness meaning that 
whenever she wipes whether after answering the   call of nature or a couple of hours later there 
is nothing she should insert a tampon and if the   tampon comes out clean then she may take ghusl as 
this is her sign of Purity and Allah Knows Best and have you ever taken a counseling session with 
me go to my website and you will find counseling   sessions and apply for one if you can afford it 
that's good for you if you cannot you're entitled   for one free session and this is for everybody 
if they can affirm by Allah that they cannot   afford it because they're poor I'll give them 
one free session without a problem a full half   an hour so come to me and let's speak about 
it inshallah within the following two days   or three days I will uh try and seek Allah's 
guidance to solve the problem once and for All
